text: geuleohan iyulo geudaelo hayeo geum geudeul-eul mid-eum-eulo indohala ham ini geudaega myeonglyeongbad-eundaelo gangjigha la geuligo geudeul-ui yuhog-eul ttaleuji malmyeo illeogalodoe naneun hananimkkeseo gyesihan seongseoleul mid-eumyeo naega myeonglyeong bad-eun daelo neohuileul jeongdanghage maj-i halila hananim-eun uliui junim-iyo neohui junim-isini uliegeneun uli ui haeng-wie daehan chaeg-im-i iss-eumyeo neo huiegeneun neohui haeng-wie daehan chaeg-im i issnola geuleomeulo uliwa neohui saie nonjaeng-i pil-yochi anhnola ha nanim-eun ulileul hamkke bulleo gasini uliui mogjeogjineun geubun-isila
